sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_uib_notify.NotifyUXFUtilSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>NotifyUXFUtilSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var NotifyUXFUtilSNC = Class.create();
NotifyUXFUtilSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    ALLOWED_UXF_EVENTS: {
        OPEN_URL_WINDOW: 1
    },

    supportsPostUXFEvent: function(uxfEvent) {
        if (uxfEvent in this.ALLOWED_UXF_EVENTS) {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    getSanitizedEventActions: function(providerActions) {
        for (var providers in providerActions) {
            if (!providerActions[providers]) {
                continue;
            }
            for (var eventAction in providerActions[providers]) {
                var actions = {};
                var action = providerActions[providers][eventAction];
                for (var key in action) {
                    var actionData = action[key];
                    var refinedActions = [];
                    for (var index in actionData) {
                        var event = actionData[index].event;
                        if (this.supportsPostUXFEvent(event)) {
                            refinedActions.push(actionData[index]);
                        }
                    }
                    actions[key] = refinedActions;
                }
                providerActions[providers][eventAction] = actions;
            }
        }
        return providerActions;
    },

    type: 'NotifyUXFUtilSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-07 14:22:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0c3e417d77ce21103da5e297cd5a991c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>NotifyUXFUtilSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notify UI Components for Configurable Workspaces" source="sn_uib_notify">fd42a0b9eba16110ca5583402a5228f7</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Notify UI Components for Configurable Workspaces">fd42a0b9eba16110ca5583402a5228f7</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0c3e417d77ce21103da5e297cd5a991c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-06-06 10:03:24</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
